single_domain_60.title: Single domain, 1km cell size, fast and simple
single_domain_60.info: Only one domain, 60x60 grid cells of size 1km with 25m fire grid. Domain will be centered on ignition point.

two_domain_120_60.title: Two domains, 3km/1km cell size, 25m fire grid.
two_domain_120_60.info: A two-domain configuration with the top-level domain at 3km grid size and 100x100 grid points. The nested domain has 1km resolution and is 40x40 km with a 25m fire grid.

three_domain_900_300_40.title: Three domains, 9km/3km/1km cell size, 25m fire grid.
three_domain_900_300_40.info: A three-domain configuration with the top-level domain at 9km grid size and 100x100 grid points. The first nest has a 3km resolution and the second nest has a 1km resolution with a 25m fire grid.

four_domain_9_3_1_03_22.title: Four domains, 9km/3km/1km/0.33km cell size, 22m fire grid.
four_domain_9_3_1_03_22.info: A four-domain configuration with the top-level domain at 9km grid size and 64x64 grid points.  The first nest has a 3km resolution the second nest has 1km resolution, the third nest has 333m resolution with a 22m fire grid.

four_domain_large.title: Four domains, 9km/3km/1km/0.33km cell size, 30m fire grid.
four_domain_large.info: A large four-domain configuration with the top-level domain at 9km grid size 192x192 grid points.  The first nest has a 3km resolution the second nest has 1km resolution, the third nest has 333m resolution with a 30m fire grid, 64x64 km

three_domain_500_166_28.title: Three domains for NAM227, 5km/1.6km/0.55km cell size, 28m fire grid.
three_domain_500_166_28.info: A three-domain configuration with the top-level domain at 5km grid size and 100x100 grid points. The first nest has a 1.66km resolution and the second nest has a 555m resolution with a 28m fire grid.
